item.title: Ella Fitzgerald - Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Ella Fitzgerald version
Using the chords: A7 Am B7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Purple People Eater Ukulele Play Along With Key Changes
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of D, Eb, E, and F.
Chords Used: D, G, A7, Eb, Ab, Bb7, E, A, B7, F, Bb, C7
As performed by Sheb Wooley.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/l285RIIffvo
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: Ariana Grande - Santa Tell Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Santa Tell Me - Ariana Grande Written by Ariana Grande, Ilya Salmanzadeh and Savan Kotecha
Using the chords: A B7 Bm C D Em G G7 Gmaj7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: I Love Halloween Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Em
Chords Used: C, B7, Em, G
As performed by Stephanie Leavell at musicforkiddos.com.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/myBtxt6Hg7s

item.title: Bruno Mars - The Lazy Song
item.description:
The Lazy Song by Bruno Mars. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video was created by YouTuber gizmothing1, I digitally lowered the recording so you can play it without a capo and added the ukulele chord diagrams. The original lyric video may be found here - https://youtu.be/k1_26Iayp1s . For educational use. Chords Used: G C D B7 Am Bm Em
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Mama Cass - Dream A Little Dream Of Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Dream A Little Dream Of Me - The Mamas & The Paps Music by Fabian Andre and Wilbur Schwandt and lyrics by Gus Kahn
Using the chords: A A7 Bm B7 C E7 F Fm F#m G7 Ab
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This is not an easy play along but with lots of practice it is very playable and devinitely worth the work.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey
item.description:
For educational use. For GCEA Ukulele. Key of Eb, but written in C with the intent of the player using a capo on the 3rd Fret. At the original key.
Chords Shown: C, C7, F, Fm6, G7, A7, D7, F#dim7, B7, E7, Fm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown. Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Beyoncé - SPIRIT
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G D Em C B7 Am F
Spirit (from Disney’s The Lion King) by Beyoncé. It’s been raised by 2 semitones and the modulation has been removed so beginner ukulele students can play along. Also, the “quick change” chords have not been included. As for the B7 chord, feel free to do it 432X instead of using the barre.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Tim McGraw - Live Like You Were Dying
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: The first two verses are in the key of G and uses G, C, Em, D, and 1 B7. The third verse is in the key of A and uses A, D, Gbm, E, and 1 C#.
Live Like You Were Dying by Tim McGraw. It’s the official lyric video, I just added the ukulele chords.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Jerry Duplessis - Lemonade - Alex Boye
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Lemonade on the ukulele by Alex Boye. The chords used are G C D B7 Am Bm7 Cm Em.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
